channel.title: Comments on: Red Herring Europe Top 100 – the Irish nominations are…

item.title: By: nooked™ - really simple shopping
item.dc:creator: nooked™ - really simple shopping
item.description: [...] We’re also delighted that other Irish companies were selected - Aepona, Cicero, 3V and Babelgum. [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] We’re also delighted that other Irish companies were selected – Aepona, Cicero, 3V and Babelgum. [...]

item.title: By: Brendan Lally
item.dc:creator: Brendan Lally
item.description:
Need to get IRL pushing further up the rankings.
Now; thats an easy task - right?
Maybe a brown envelope is a quick option. Heh- its a de-facto goverment standard by now :) (ok- maybe not in good taste!)
Lal
